reviewText: This is a great film to add to any Disney collection. It is fun, colorful, and well illustrated. It is entertainment for hours.
It doesn't work.. It won't load on any DVD player I have or even on blu-Ray... It pretty much sucks.. Unhappy kids are not easy to deal with!!!

Got this for my 3 kids, and I knew this was Region 2 when I bought it hoping I could find a player in my house that would work.  I had to hack a player to play Region 2 (US is Region 1) by using codes I found on this website DVDexploder.com.  I played it and it is darker and edgier than the House of Mouse Villains DVD.  Maybe this is why it was not released in the US?  It is pretty darn scary in parts, so I will give it away to a grown up Disneyphile I know.  It is a witch trying to see which villain she will join forces with and so it gives you lots of clips from all the Disney movies with some games on there, too.  My favorite is Ursula in Little Mermaid but the rest is not very funny, just dark, but the animation and clips are beautiful to look at.

Listing did not mention that disc was region 2 (europe).  Who sells region 2 in the USA??  I guess I was supposed to KNOW this.  Amazon says I pay return postage.  Bad feedback earned as far as I am concerned.
the only bad thing is this disc is region 2 ?  but it played on my computer,  this Reminded me of all those old Disney Halloween Specials  Great Fun
Don't buy it! It doesn't work! It cannot play on a US device.

Doesn't work in US dvd players.  Waste of money.
